data.title: The Scar (SIGNED) by China Mieville: New HARDCOVER (2019) Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - HARDCOVER - 2019 - Condition: New - New. 20-C-29 Subterranean Press 2019 Hardcover. SIGNED by author on limitations page. This signed edition is limited to 500 numbered copies, of which this is number 466. Book Condition; New . 2019. HARDCOVER. - The Scar (SIGNED)
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We accept PayPal.com payments. U.S. checks (cashier, personal or company), and money orders are accepted. All books paid by check will be shipped upon check's clearance with our bank. Books shipped within Texas state limits must pay 8.25% sales tax. Read description carefully & inquire if anything is not clear. Returns are accepted in 14 days of shipment receipt. Please call for returns approval.

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship every Monday, Wednesday & Friday. Items will ship via the most economical method in their delivery class. All items will be shipped securely to insure that they arrive in the same condition in which they left. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
